about_the_game:
Embark on a Norse Adventure with Taylor, the Fierce Viking!

Experience the Thrill of Norse Mythology with Taylor

Journey to a world of myth and magic with Taylor, a bold Viking cosplayer with incredible craftsmanship. This captivating content invites you to explore a realm of adventure, history, and fantasy as you connect with this fierce and inspiring character.

About Tayloer:

  • Epic Dates: Experience unforgettable dates filled with adventure, from historical reenactments to fantasy conventions.

  • Shared Passions: Discover Taylor's love for cosplay, history, and Norse mythology, and share your own passions with her.

  • Romantic Moments: Create lasting memories as you build a strong emotional connection with Taylor.

  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in beautifully environments and character designs that bring Taylor's world to life.

Perfect for Fans of:

  • Romantic visual novels

  • Dating simulators

  • Fantasy

  • Cosplay and historical reenactments

Don't miss your chance to experience the thrill of Taylor's story. Purchase the DLC today and start your own Norse adventure!

Taylor is a bold Viking cosplayer with incredible craftsmanship. Her adventurous spirit and striking presence steal the show.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full nudity, front and back of several all characters

You can set up a scene and simulate sex with a 3D model.

The animations simulate sexual positions, and it is possible to move the camera freely around the scene, having a complete perspective of the sexual act.

There is nothing forced in the game.

All situations and characters were made just to simulate pleasure in a passionate and light way.

It is possible to see in detail the characters facial expressions and erogenous zones, including genitalias. 

You must be legal age of majority or over to play this game.
